description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. title: Available Early January, Move in for the New Year!
description:
Available early January, move in for the New Year! Showcasing waterfront and city views from the exclusive vantage of a spacious unit in the Society Hill Towers (designed by IM Pei), this stunning two bedroom condo was designed to impress. Featuring floor to ceiling windows with custom treatments, vinyl plank wood flooring, an open concept living area, modern fixtures, and coveted building amenities including a 24 hour concierge, maintenance, as well as underground Parking, health club, and seasonal pool available for an additional monthly fee, this residence has it all. Rent includes all utilities and basic cable/ internet. Upon entry through the gracious foyer, you will be entranced by the boundless views and natural light shining through the spacious, open living and dining area. The beautiful kitchen will instantly inspire you to begin preparing meals with features such as stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and upper and lower cabinetry. The main bedroom is complete with a walk-in cedar closet, tons of space, and stunning views of the river. The second bedroom also includes ample closet space, river views, and tons of opportunity for a home office, guest suite, and more. Tiled hall bath just off the hall and across from both of the two bedrooms. The conveniences continue with a small supermarket on site with delivery service, as well as a dry cleaners and the well regarded Zahav Restaurant. title: SPECTACULAR 3 BED, 2 BATH HOME ON A TREE-LINED STREET IN FITLER SQUARE
description:
Spectacular 3 Bed, 2 Bath home on a tree lined street in Fitler Square and the GREENFIELD CATCHMENT!!!! Enter through the chic black and white brick exterior and find a freshly painted first floor highlighted by hardwood floors, an exposed brick wall and multiple windows which fill the rooms with an abundance of natural light. A two-story ceiling gives the Living Room a sense of airiness while the space maintains a cozy ambiance thanks to its brick fireplace. The Dining Room is a charming space that is well lit from warm track lighting beneath exposed beams. Walk into the kitchen and you will find plenty of cabinetry, a gas stove top and granite countertops that provide ample working space. Next to the Kitchen is a charming small Patio that is perfect for dining al fresco. Ascend the Living Room stairs to find the second floor complete with a Full Bath and a Primary Bedroom that provides ample closet space, ceiling fan and hardwood floors throughout. Two more Bedrooms and a Full Bath can be found on the third floor. The Fully Finished Basement is the perfect place to entertain guests for a football game or an enjoyable place to watch tv while folding laundry (also located in the Basement). description:
Beautiful and spacious porch front property located in Roxborough-Manayunk which features 3 light-filled Bedrooms and 1.5 Baths. Upstairs there are 3 generous sized Bedrooms that share a full Bath. There is a full size basement with a workbench and tons of space with shelving for storage!
This home is conveniently located in walking distance of the Wissahickon train station, bus routes, Fairmount Park, Main Street Manayunk restaurants and shops or jump on Rt. 76 or Kelly Drive in 5 minutes to minimize your commute.

Small, well-behaved, trained dogs considered.

title: STUNNING, COMPLETELY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM RESIDENCE!
description:
Stunning, completely renovated two bedroom, two bathroom residence located on the 19th floor of The Academy House along the Avenue of the Arts! Enter into the foyer with black tile floors and coat closet. The large eat-in kitchen has granite countertops, a peninsula, breakfast nook, modern wood cabinets, subway tile back splash and stainless steel appliances including a Frigidaire electric range, oven and microwave, a Kitchenaid refrigerator, and a Whirlpool dishwasher. The adjacent great room has hardwood floors and city views to the south and east from a private Juliet balcony which can be accessed from each room. The primary suite has great closet space and a spacious ensuite bathroom which features a shower/tub with subway tile and a double vanity. The second bedroom is spacious and also has a large amount of closet space. Directly across is the hall bathroom which has tile flooring, a contemporary glass vanity, and a shower/tub. There is a Maytag stackable washer/dryer in the unit. No detail was left undone in this showplace condominium. The terrace doors were pushed out to increase interior square footage. Residents of Academy House enjoy a 24-hour doorman and a state-of-the-art fitness and aquatic center. There is valet parking in the building's garage for an additional monthly fee, subject to availability. The Academy House is located in the heart of Center City and within close walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square, and the Broad Street and Market Street office corridors. The Philadelphia International Airport and Amtrak's 30th Street Station are easily accessible.
1420 Locust St #19F

title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:

description:
Welcome to Unit 15A in the fabulous Ellington building! Unit 15A is a light-filled, south facing corner unit in one of the more spacious layouts of the building. High up on the 15th floor, you have views of South Philadelphia as well as the iconic Comcast building! High ceilings and oversized windows make for a comfortable living & dining space. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space plus stainless steel appliances. Storage is not an issue in this unit - the hall is lined with deep closets for all of your belongings and both bedrooms have ample closet space. The Ellington is a secure, convenient building with a 24-hour concierge, fitness center, meeting & party rooms, and a library. title: SCAM - Updated One Bedroom En Suite Bathroom W/Parking
description:
SCAM - he has been posting in other cities as well.
This is a great 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom first floor condo located on N 3rd Street in Old City with a great back patio for outdoor space! Inside, there is an open layout with beautiful wood plank flooring and a pass-through kitchen with pendant lighting. The updated kitchen features new backsplash, white cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. There is oversized custom trim in the living room and dining area and a convenient slider leading out back. The condo also includes a full bath with glass shower door, tile flooring, modern vanity, fresh neutral paint throughout and a laundry area! The bedroom has a large walk-in closet with custom built-ins. This home is move in ready and includes extra storage in the basement. You can't beat the location, great neighborhood, convenient to restaurants and shopping with easy access to the Ben Franklin Bridge and 95! I am a 44 y/o professional man currently separating from my wife.  I am the VP of a local automation distributor and have been employed there 18 years. I’m looking for a clean tenant to rent this unit temporarily as I am back to ME for work. So at this point, I would like to go month to month indefinitely.
Erin

title: Lease takeover for 1 bedroom 1 bath apt
description:
Hi evryone! Thank you for looking. I am looking for someone to take over my lease so I don't have to break my lease as that is very costly which I can't afford being I have to leave so sudden so u will be helping me as I help you. We will be signing the lease over to you & will be able to renew the lease after this current lease is over which is 6/30/23, so then your actual lease will start after that. I was advised instead of paying the property manager the security deposit & last months rent u would be paying me once u get approved which is $2k total. They will keep what I initially paid for the deposit/last months for your stay of the lease you will get that back whenever you decide to move out.  I am moving back home late dec to help care for my father who is ill recently. This is a really good place for the price and how much space you get. Good for 1 or 2 people. Water is 30 every month and you only pay for your own electric and wifi.
I usually have to pay 70-80$ for both
Please let me know if you are interested
I need to find someone by DEC 20 as I leave the last week of dec.
